General.Name: DoubleU Games Co Ltd
General.Description: DoubleUGames Co., Ltd. develops games. The company offers W. Casino, a social casino game, as well as table games and slot machines. It also operates one source multiplatform, as well as offers PC and mobile games. DoubleUGames Co., Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: Gangnam Finance Center, Seoul, South Korea
